browser_snapshot.preservation_instruction: Preserve all clickable elements, form fields, and interactive components. Maintain page structure and navigation elements. Keep element IDs and selectors for interaction.

browser_navigate.preservation_instruction: Keep all links, buttons, and navigation elements. Preserve page title, URL, and main content structure. Include element selectors for clickable items.

browser_evaluate.preservation_instruction: Preserve evaluation results, data structures, and any error messages. Keep numerical values and computed results intact.

browser_network_requests.preservation_instruction: Keep request URLs, status codes, response headers, and error details. Summarize response bodies while preserving key data.

browser_take_screenshot.preservation_instruction: Describe screenshot content and any visible text or UI elements.

browser_click.preservation_instruction: Preserve the resulting page state after click. Keep all new interactive elements, page changes, and navigation options.
